doc:
Herbert Lomas (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herbert_Lomas_(actor) 0 Not to be confused with Herbert Lom.
Herbet Lomas (17 January 1887 – 12 April 1961) was a British actor who appeared in more than forty films in a career lasting between 1931 and 1955. He was born in Burnley, Lancashire and made his first film appearance in an early sound version of Hobson's Choice (1931). Not to_be_confused with Herbert_Lom . Herbet_Lomas_(_17_January_1887 – 12_April_1961 ) was a_British_actor who appeared in more_than_forty_films in a_career lasting between 1931_and_1955 . He was_born in Burnley , Lancashire and made his_first_film_appearance in an_early_sound_version of Hobson 's_Choice_(_1931_) .
